dmca.title: Help - with Stolen Content
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


________________________________

From: John Kenny [mailto:johnkenny@dsl.pipex.com] 
Sent: Saturday, December 30, 2006 12:35 PM
To: abuse; Legal Response
Subject: Help - with Stolen Content


Please can you help.
 
A company who's website is hosted by you, has blatantly stolen content
from a site I manage.
 
They have copied text word for word, copied images and on another page
are linking to images on my site as well as using the text without my
permission - therefore stealing my bandwidth.
 
At this stage I do not wish to name the company who is doing this and
would just like to hear what your view is on the situation.
 
I notice you have the following clause in your terms and conditions:
 
  

Intellectual Property Infringement Policy

Customers may not transmit, distribute, download, copy, cache, host, or
otherwise store on a Server any information, data, material, or work
that infringes the intellectual property rights of others. The Planet
has the right to disable access to, or remove, infringing content to the
extent required under any law or regulation, including the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998.

The Planet reserves the right to suspend permanently or terminate the
Services of any Customer that repeatedly violates The Planet's
Intellectual Property Infringement Policy or any copyright law.

 
Whilst I have not gone down the route of copywriting my material in the
past, this text and the images are my Intellectual Property.
 
I look forward to hearing your response.
 
Thanks in advance
